title: JSON schema for Renovate config files (https://renovatebot.com/)

addLabels.description: Labels to add to Pull Request.

additionalBranchPrefix.description: Additional string value to be appended to `branchPrefix`.

additionalReviewers.description: Additional reviewers for Pull Requests (in contrast to `reviewers`, this option adds to the existing reviewer list, rather than replacing it).

allowCustomCrateRegistries.description: Set this to `true` to allow custom crate registries.

allowPlugins.description: Set this to `true` if repositories are allowed to run install plugins.

allowPostUpgradeCommandTemplating.description: Set this to `true` to allow templating for post-upgrade commands.

allowScripts.description: Set this to `true` if repositories are allowed to run install scripts.

allowedPostUpgradeCommands.description: A list of regular expressions that decide which post-upgrade tasks are allowed.

ansible.description: Configuration object for the ansible manager

ansible-galaxy.description: Configuration object for the ansible-galaxy manager

argocd.description: Configuration object for the argocd manager

asdf.description: Configuration object for the asdf manager

assignAutomerge.description: Assign reviewers and assignees even if the PR is to be automerged.

assignees.description: Assignees for Pull Request (either username or email address depending on the platform).

assigneesFromCodeOwners.description: Determine assignees based on configured code owners and changes in PR.

assigneesSampleSize.description: Take a random sample of given size from `assignees`.

autoApprove.description: Set to `true` to automatically approve PRs.

autoReplaceGlobalMatch.description: Control whether replacement regular expressions are global matches or only the first match.

autodiscoverFilter.description: Filter the list of autodiscovered repositories.

automerge.description: Whether to automerge branches/PRs automatically, without human intervention.

automergeComment.description: PR comment to add to trigger automerge. Only used if `automergeType=pr-comment`.

automergeSchedule.description: Limit automerge to these times of day or week.

automergeStrategy.description: The merge strategy to use when automerging PRs. Used only if `automergeType=pr`.

azure-pipelines.description: Configuration object for the azure-pipelines manager

azureWorkItemId.description: The id of an existing work item on Azure Boards to link to each PR.

baseBranches.description: List of one or more custom base branches defined as exact strings and/or via regex expressions.

baseDir.description: The base directory for Renovate to store local files, including repository files and cache. If left empty, Renovate will create its own temporary directory to use.

batect.description: Configuration object for the batect manager

batect-wrapper.description: Configuration object for the batect-wrapper manager

bazel.description: Configuration object for the bazel manager

bazel-module.description: Configuration object for the bazel-module manager

bazelisk.description: Configuration object for the bazelisk manager

bbUseDevelopmentBranch.description: Use the repository's [development branch](https://support.atlassian.com/bitbucket-cloud/docs/branch-a-repository/#The-branching-model) as the repository's default branch.

bicep.description: Configuration object for the bicep manager

binarySource.description: Controls how third-party tools like npm or Gradle are called: directly, via Docker sidecar containers, or via dynamic install.

bitbucket-pipelines.description: Configuration object for the bitbucket-pipelines manager

branchConcurrentLimit.description: Limit to a maximum of x concurrent branches. 0 means no limit, `null` (default) inherits value from `prConcurrentLimit`.

branchNameStrict.description: Whether to be strict about the use of special characters within the branch name.

branchPrefix.description: Prefix to use for all branch names.

branchPrefixOld.description: Old branchPrefix value to check for existing PRs.

buildkite.description: Configuration object for the buildkite manager

bumpVersion.description: Bump the version in the package file being updated.

bundler.description: Configuration object for the bundler manager

cacheDir.description: The directory where Renovate stores its cache. If left empty, Renovate creates a subdirectory within the `baseDir`.

cacheHardTtlMinutes.description: Maximum duration in minutes to keep datasource cache entries.

cake.description: Configuration object for the cake manager

cargo.description: Configuration object for the cargo manager

cdnurl.description: Configuration object for the cdnurl manager

checkedBranches.description: A list of branch names to mark for creation or rebasing as if it was selected in the Dependency Dashboard issue.

circleci.description: Configuration object for the circleci manager

cloneSubmodules.description: Set to `true` to initialize submodules during repository clone.

cloudbuild.description: Configuration object for the cloudbuild manager

cocoapods.description: Configuration object for the cocoapods manager

commitBody.description: Commit message body template. Will be appended to commit message, separated by two line returns.

commitBodyTable.description: If enabled, append a table in the commit message body describing all updates in the commit.

commitMessage.description: Message to use for commit messages and pull request titles.

commitMessageAction.description: Action verb to use in commit messages and PR titles.

commitMessageExtra.description: Extra description used after the commit message topic - typically the version.

commitMessagePrefix.description: Prefix to add to start of commit messages and PR titles. Uses a semantic prefix if `semanticCommits` is enabled.

commitMessageSuffix.description: Suffix to add to end of commit messages and PR titles.

commitMessageTopic.description: The upgrade topic/noun used in commit messages and PR titles.

composer.description: Configuration object for the composer manager

composerIgnorePlatformReqs.description: Configure use of `--ignore-platform-reqs` or `--ignore-platform-req` for the Composer package manager.

conan.description: Configuration object for the conan manager

confidential.description: If enabled, issues created by Renovate are set as confidential.

configMigration.description: Enable this to get config migration PRs when needed.

configWarningReuseIssue.description: Set this to `false` to make Renovate create a new issue for each config warning, instead of reopening or reusing an existing issue.

constraints.description: Configuration object to define language or manager version constraints.

constraintsFiltering.description: Perform release filtering based on language constraints.

containerbaseDir.description: The directory where Renovate stores its containerbase cache. If left empty, Renovate creates a subdirectory within the `cacheDir`.

cpanfile.description: Configuration object for the cpanfile manager

customEnvVariables.description: Custom environment variables for child processes and sidecar Docker containers.

defaultRegistryUrls.description: List of registry URLs to use as the default for a datasource.

dependencyDashboard.description: Whether to create a "Dependency Dashboard" issue in the repository.

dependencyDashboardApproval.description: Controls if updates need manual approval from the Dependency Dashboard issue before PRs are created.

dependencyDashboardAutoclose.description: Set to `true` to let Renovate close the Dependency Dashboard issue if there are no more updates.

dependencyDashboardFooter.description: Any text added here will be placed last in the Dependency Dashboard issue body, with a divider separator before it.

dependencyDashboardHeader.description: Any text added here will be placed first in the Dependency Dashboard issue body.
dependencyDashboardHeader.default: This issue lists Renovate updates and detected dependencies. Read the [Dependency Dashboard](https://docs.renovatebot.com/key-concepts/dashboard/) docs to learn more.

dependencyDashboardLabels.description: These labels will always be applied on the Dependency Dashboard issue, even when they have been removed manually.

dependencyDashboardOSVVulnerabilitySumma.description: Control if the Dependency Dashboard issue lists CVEs supplied by [osv.dev](https://osv.dev).

dependencyDashboardTitle.description: Title for the Dependency Dashboard issue.

deps-edn.description: Configuration object for the deps-edn manager

description.description: Plain text description for a config or preset.

detectGlobalManagerConfig.description: If `true`, Renovate tries to detect global manager configuration from the file system.

detectHostRulesFromEnv.description: If `true`, Renovate tries to detect host rules from environment variables.

digest.description: Configuration to apply when updating a digest (no change in tag/version).

docker-compose.description: Configuration object for the docker-compose manager

dockerChildPrefix.description: Change this value to add a prefix to the Renovate Docker sidecar container names and labels.

dockerImagePrefix.description: Change this value to override the default Renovate Docker sidecar image name prefix.

dockerUser.description: Set the `UID` and `GID` for Docker-based binaries if you use `binarySource=docker`.

dockerfile.description: Configuration object for the dockerfile manager

draftPR.description: If set to `true` then Renovate creates draft PRs, instead of normal status PRs.

droneci.description: Configuration object for the droneci manager

dryRun.description: If enabled, perform a dry run by logging messages instead of creating/updating/deleting branches and PRs.

enabledManagers.description: A list of package managers to enable. Only managers on the list are enabled.

encrypted.description: An object containing configuration encrypted with project key.

excludeCommitPaths.description: A file matching any of these glob patterns will not be committed, even if the file has been updated.

executionTimeout.description: Default execution timeout in minutes for child processes Renovate creates.

exposeAllEnv.description: Set this to `true` to allow passing of all environment variables to package managers.

extends.description: Configuration presets to use or extend.

extractVersion.description: A regex (`re2`) to extract a version from a datasource's raw version string.

fetchReleaseNotes.description: Controls if release notes are fetched.

fileMatch.description: RegEx (`re2`) pattern for matching manager files.

filterUnavailableUsers.description: Filter reviewers and assignees based on their availability.

fleet.description: Configuration object for the fleet manager

flux.description: Configuration object for the flux manager

followTag.description: If defined, packages will follow this release tag exactly.

force.description: Any configuration set in this object will force override existing settings.

forceCli.description: Decides if CLI configuration options are moved to the `force` config section.

forkModeDisallowMaintainerEdits.description: Disallow maintainers to push to Renovate pull requests when running in fork mode.

forkProcessing.description: Whether to process forked repositories. By default, all forked repositories are skipped when in `autodiscover` mode.

forkToken.description: Set a personal access token here to enable "fork mode".

fvm.description: Configuration object for the fvm manager

git-submodules.description: Configuration object for the git-submodules manager

gitAuthor.description: Author to use for Git commits. Must conform to [RFC5322](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5322).

gitIgnoredAuthors.description: Additional Git authors which are ignored by Renovate. Must conform to [RFC5322](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5322).

gitLabIgnoreApprovals.description: Ignore approval rules for MRs created by Renovate, which is useful for automerge.

gitNoVerify.description: Which Git commands will be run with the `--no-verify` option.

gitPrivateKey.description: PGP key to use for signing Git commits.

gitTimeout.description: Configure the timeout with a number of milliseconds to wait for a Git task.

gitUrl.description: Overrides the default resolution for Git remote, e.g. to switch GitLab from HTTPS to SSH-based.

github-actions.description: Configuration object for the github-actions manager

githubTokenWarn.description: Display warnings about GitHub token not being set.

gitlabci.description: Configuration object for the gitlabci manager

gitlabci-include.description: Configuration object for the gitlabci-include manager

globalExtends.description: Configuration presets to use or extend for a self-hosted config.

goGetDirs.description: Directory pattern to run `go get` on

gomod.description: Configuration object for the gomod manager

gradle.description: Configuration object for the gradle manager

gradle-wrapper.description: Configuration object for the gradle-wrapper manager

groupName.description: Human understandable name for the dependency group.

groupSlug.description: Slug to use for group (e.g. in branch name). Slug is calculated from `groupName` if `null`.

hashedBranchLength.description: If enabled, branch names will use a hashing function to ensure each branch has that length.

helm-requirements.description: Configuration object for the helm-requirements manager

helm-values.description: Configuration object for the helm-values manager

helmfile.description: Configuration object for the helmfile manager

helmsman.description: Configuration object for the helmsman manager

helmv3.description: Configuration object for the helmv3 manager

hermit.description: Configuration object for the hermit manager

homebrew.description: Configuration object for the homebrew manager

description.description: A custom description for this configuration object

abortIgnoreStatusCodes.description: A list of HTTP status codes safe to ignore even when `abortOnError=true`.

abortOnError.description: If enabled, Renovate aborts its run when HTTP request errors occur.

artifactAuth.description: A list of package managers to enable artifact auth. Only managers on the list are enabled. All are enabled if `null`

authType.description: Authentication type for HTTP header. e.g. `"Bearer"` or `"Basic"`. Use `"Token-Only"` to use only the token without an authorization type.

hostType.description: hostType for a package rule. Can be a platform name or a datasource name.

insecureRegistry.description: Explicitly turn on insecure Docker registry access (HTTP).

matchHost.description: A domain name, host name or base URL to match against.

timeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for queries to external endpoints.

html.description: Configuration object for the html manager

ignoreDeprecated.description: Avoid upgrading from a non-deprecated version to a deprecated one.

ignorePaths.description: Skip any package file whose path matches one of these. Can be a string or glob pattern.

ignorePlugins.description: Set this to `true` if `allowPlugins=true` but you wish to skip running plugins when updating lock files.

ignorePrAuthor.description: Set to `true` to fetch the entire list of PRs instead of only those authored by the Renovate user.

ignorePresets.description: A list of presets to ignore, including any that are nested inside an `extends` array.

ignoreReviewers.description: Reviewers to be ignored in PR reviewers presence (either username or email address depending on the platform).

ignoreScripts.description: Set this to `false` if `allowScripts=true` and you wish to run scripts when updating lock files.

ignoreTests.description: Set to `true` to enable automerging without tests.

includePaths.description: Include package files only within these defined paths.

internalChecksAsSuccess.description: Whether to consider passing internal checks such as `minimumReleaseAge` when determining branch status.

internalChecksFilter.description: When and how to filter based on internal checks.

java.description: Configuration object for all Java package managers.

jenkins.description: Configuration object for the jenkins manager

jsonnet-bundler.description: Configuration object for the jsonnet-bundler manager

kotlin-script.description: Configuration object for the kotlin-script manager

kubernetes.description: Configuration object for the kubernetes manager

kustomize.description: Configuration object for the kustomize manager

labels.description: Labels to set in Pull Request.

leiningen.description: Configuration object for the leiningen manager

logContext.description: Add a global or per-repo log context to each log entry.

logFileLevel.description: Set the log file log level.

major.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is `major`.

maven.description: Configuration object for the maven manager

maven-wrapper.description: Configuration object for the maven-wrapper manager

meteor.description: Configuration object for the meteor manager

migratePresets.description: Define presets here which have been removed or renamed and should be migrated automatically.

minimumReleaseAge.description: Time required before a new release is considered stable.

minor.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is `minor`.

mint.description: Configuration object for the mint manager

mix.description: Configuration object for the mix manager

nix.description: Configuration object for the nix manager

node.description: Configuration object for Node version renovation.

nodenv.description: Configuration object for the nodenv manager

npm.description: Configuration object for the npm manager

npmToken.description: npm token used to authenticate with the default registry.

npmrc.description: String copy of `.npmrc` file. Use `\n` instead of line breaks.

npmrcMerge.description: Whether to merge `config.npmrc` with repo `.npmrc` content if both are found.

nuget.description: Configuration object for the nuget manager

nvm.description: Configuration object for the nvm manager

onboardingBranch.description: Change this value to override the default onboarding branch name.

onboardingCommitMessage.description: Change this value to override the default onboarding commit message.

onboardingConfig.description: Configuration to use for onboarding PRs.

onboardingConfigFileName.description: Change this value to override the default onboarding config file name.

onboardingNoDeps.description: Onboard the repository even if no dependencies are found.

onboardingPrTitle.description: Change this value to override the default onboarding PR title.

onboardingRebaseCheckbox.description: Set to enable rebase/retry markdown checkbox for onboarding PRs.

optimizeForDisabled.description: Set to `true` to perform a check for disabled config prior to cloning.

osgi.description: Configuration object for the osgi manager

description.description: A custom description for this configuration object

allowedVersions.description: A version range or regex pattern capturing allowed versions for dependencies.

customChangelogUrl.description: If set, Renovate will use this URL to fetch changelogs for a matched dependency. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

excludeDepNames.description: Dep names to exclude. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

excludeDepPatterns.description: Dep name patterns to exclude. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

excludePackageNames.description: Package names to exclude. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

excludePackagePatterns.description: Package name patterns to exclude. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

excludePackagePrefixes.description: Package name prefixes to exclude. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchBaseBranches.description: List of strings containing exact matches (e.g. `["main"]`) and/or regex expressions (e.g. `["/^release/.*/"]`). Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchConfidence.description: Merge confidence levels to match against (`low`, `neutral`, `high`, `very high`). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchCurrentValue.description: A regex to match against the raw `currentValue` string of a dependency. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchCurrentVersion.description: A version or range of versions to match against the current version of a package. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchDatasources.description: List of datasources to match (e.g. `["orb"]`). Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchDepNames.description: Dep names to match. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchDepPatterns.description: Dep name patterns to match. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchDepTypes.description: List of depTypes to match (e.g. [`peerDependencies`]). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

matchFiles.description: List of strings to do an exact match against package and lock files with full path. Only works inside a `packageRules` object.

matchLanguages.description: List of languages to match (e.g. `["python"]`). Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchManagers.description: List of package managers to match (e.g. `["pipenv"]`). Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchPackageNames.description: Package names to match. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchPackagePatterns.description: Package name patterns to match. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchPackagePrefixes.description: Package name prefixes to match. Valid only within a `packageRules` object.

matchPaths.description: List of strings or glob patterns to match against package files. Only works inside a `packageRules` object.

matchSourceUrlPrefixes.description: A list of source URL prefixes to match against, commonly used to group monorepos or packages from the same organization.

matchSourceUrls.description: A list of source URLs to exact match against.

matchUpdateTypes.description: Update types to match against (`major`, `minor`, `pin`, `pinDigest`, etc). Valid only within `packageRules` object.

replacementName.description: The name of the new dependency that replaces the old deprecated dependency.

replacementNameTemplate.description: Controls what the replacement package name.

replacementVersion.description: The version of the new dependency that replaces the old deprecated dependency.

patch.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is `patch`.

pep621.description: Configuration object for the pep621 manager

persistRepoData.description: If set to `true`: keep repository data between runs instead of deleting the data.

pin.description: Configuration to apply when an update type is `pin`.

pinDigest.description: Configuration to apply when pinning a digest (no change in tag/version).

pinDigests.description: Whether to add digests to Dockerfile source images.

pip-compile.description: Configuration object for the pip-compile manager

pip_requirements.description: Configuration object for the pip_requirements manager

pip_setup.description: Configuration object for the pip_setup manager

pipenv.description: Configuration object for the pipenv manager

platformAutomerge.description: Controls if platform-native auto-merge is used.

platformCommit.description: Use platform API to perform commits instead of using Git directly.

poetry.description: Configuration object for the poetry manager

postUpdateOptions.description: Enable post-update options to be run after package/artifact updating.

postUpgradeTasks.description: Post-upgrade tasks that are executed before a commit is made by Renovate.

description.description: A custom description for this configuration object

commands.description: A list of post-upgrade commands that are executed before a commit is made by Renovate.

executionMode.description: Controls when the post upgrade tasks run: on every update, or once per upgrade branch.

fileFilters.description: Files that match the glob pattern will be committed after running a post-upgrade task.

prBodyColumns.description: List of columns to use in PR bodies.

prBodyDefinitions.description: Table column definitions to use in PR tables.

prBodyNotes.description: List of additional notes/templates to include in the Pull Request body.

prBodyTemplate.description: Pull Request body template. Controls which sections are rendered in the body of the pull request.

prCommitsPerRunLimit.description: Set the maximum number of commits per Renovate run. By default there is no limit.

prConcurrentLimit.description: Limit to a maximum of x concurrent branches/PRs. 0 means no limit.

prCreation.description: When to create the PR for a branch.

prFooter.description: Text added here will be placed last in the PR body, with a divider separator before it.
prFooter.default: This PR has been generated by [Renovate Bot](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate).

prHeader.description: Text added here will be placed first in the PR body.

prHourlyLimit.description: Rate limit PRs to maximum x created per hour. 0 means no limit.

prPriority.description: Set sorting priority for PR creation. PRs with higher priority are created first, negative priority last.

prTitle.description: Pull Request title template (deprecated). Inherits from `commitMessage` if null.

prTitleStrict.description: Whether to bypass appending extra context to the Pull Request title.

pre-commit.description: Configuration object for the pre-commit manager

prBodyNotes: Note: The `pre-commit` manager in Renovate is not supported by the `pre-commit` maintainers or community. Please do not report any problems there, instead [create a Discussion in the Renovate repository](https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/discussions/new) if you have any questions.

printConfig.description: If enabled, Renovate logs the fully resolved config for each repository, plus the fully resolved presets.

privateKeyOld.description: Secondary or old private key to try.

privateKeyPath.description: Path to the Server-side private key.

privateKeyPathOld.description: Path to the Server-side old private key.

productLinks.description: Links which are used in PRs, issues and comments.

pruneBranchAfterAutomerge.description: Set to `true` to enable branch pruning after automerging.

pruneStaleBranches.description: Set to `false` to disable pruning stale branches.

pub.description: Configuration object for the pub manager

puppet.description: Configuration object for the puppet manager

pyenv.description: Configuration object for the pyenv manager

rangeStrategy.description: Determines how to modify or update existing ranges.

rebaseLabel.description: Label to request a rebase from Renovate bot.

rebaseWhen.description: Controls when Renovate rebases an existing branch.

recreateClosed.description: Recreate PRs even if same ones were closed previously.

redisUrl.description: If set, this Redis URL will be used for caching instead of the file system.

regex.description: Configuration object for the regex manager

description.description: A custom description for this configuration object

autoReplaceStringTemplate.description: Optional `extractVersion` for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

currentValueTemplate.description: Optional `currentValue` for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

datasourceTemplate.description: Optional datasource for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

depNameTemplate.description: Optional depName for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

depTypeTemplate.description: Optional `depType` for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

extractVersionTemplate.description: Optional `extractVersion` for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

matchStrings.description: Regex capture rule to use. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

packageNameTemplate.description: Optional packageName for extracted dependencies, else defaults to `depName` value. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

registryUrlTemplate.description: Optional registry URL for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

versioningTemplate.description: Optional versioning for extracted dependencies. Valid only within a `regexManagers` object.

registryUrls.description: List of URLs to try for dependency lookup. Package manager specific.

replacement.description: Configuration to apply when replacing a dependency.

prBodyNotes: This is a special PR that replaces `{{{depNameSanitized}}}` with the community suggested minimal stable replacement version.

repositoryCache.description: This option decides if Renovate uses a JSON cache to speed up extractions.

repositoryCacheType.description: Set the type of renovate repository cache if `repositoryCache` is enabled.

requireConfig.description: Controls Renovate's behavior regarding repository config files such as `renovate.json`.

respectLatest.description: Ignore versions newer than npm "latest" version.

reviewers.description: Requested reviewers for Pull Requests (either username or email address depending on the platform).

reviewersFromCodeOwners.description: Determine reviewers based on configured code owners and changes in PR.

reviewersSampleSize.description: Take a random sample of given size from `reviewers`.

rollback.description: Configuration to apply when rolling back a version.

rollbackPrs.description: Create PRs to roll back versions if the current version is not found in the registry.

ruby-version.description: Configuration object for the ruby-version manager

rust.description: Configuration option for Rust package management.

sbt.description: Configuration object for the sbt manager

schedule.description: Limit branch creation to these times of day or week.

secrets.description: Object which holds secret name/value pairs.

semanticCommitScope.description: Commit scope to use if Semantic Commits are enabled.

semanticCommitType.description: Commit type to use if Semantic Commits is enabled.

semanticCommits.description: Enable Semantic Commit prefixes for commits and PR titles.

separateMajorMinor.description: If set to `false`, Renovate will upgrade dependencies to their latest release only. Renovate will not separate major or minor branches.

separateMinorPatch.description: If set to `true`, Renovate will separate `minor` and `patch` updates into separate branches.

separateMultipleMajor.description: If set to `true`, PRs will be raised separately for each available `major` upgrade version.

setup-cfg.description: Configuration object for the setup-cfg manager

skipInstalls.description: Skip installing modules/dependencies if lock file updating is possible without a full install.

stopUpdatingLabel.description: Label to make Renovate stop updating a PR.

suppressNotifications.description: Options to suppress various types of warnings and other notifications.

swift.description: Configuration object for the swift manager

tekton.description: Configuration object for the tekton manager

terraform.description: Configuration object for the terraform manager

terraform-version.description: Configuration object for the terraform-version manager

terragrunt.description: Configuration object for the terragrunt manager

terragrunt-version.description: Configuration object for the terragrunt-version manager

tflint-plugin.description: Configuration object for the tflint-plugin manager

travis.description: Configuration object for the travis manager

updateInternalDeps.description: Whether to update internal dep versions in a monorepo. Works on Lerna or Yarn Workspaces.

updateLockFiles.description: Set to `false` to disable lock file updating.

updateNotScheduled.description: Whether to update branches when not scheduled. Renovate will not create branches outside of the schedule.

updatePinnedDependencies.description: Whether to update pinned (single version) dependencies or not.

useBaseBranchConfig.description: Whether to read configuration from `baseBranches` instead of only the default branch.

userStrings.description: User-facing strings for the Renovate comment when a PR is closed.

default.ignoreMajor: Because you closed this PR without merging, Renovate will ignore this update. You will not get PRs for *any* future {{{newMajor}}}.x releases. But if you manually upgrade to {{{newMajor}}}.x then Renovate will re-enable `minor` and `patch` updates automatically.
default.ignoreDigest: Because you closed this PR without merging, Renovate will ignore this update. You will not get PRs for the `{{{depName}}}` `{{{newDigestShort}}}` update again.
default.ignoreOther: Because you closed this PR without merging, Renovate will ignore this update ({{{newValue}}}). You will get a PR once a newer version is released. To ignore this dependency forever, add it to the `ignoreDeps` array of your Renovate config.

velaci.description: Configuration object for the velaci manager

versioning.description: Versioning to use for filtering and comparisons.

vulnerabilityAlerts.description: Config to apply when a PR is needed due to a vulnerability in the existing package version.

woodpecker.description: Configuration object for the woodpecker manager

writeDiscoveredRepos.description: Writes discovered repositories to a JSON file and then exit.
